name: iCursor Effect File
summary: Learn about .ICURSORFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: iCursor effects are saved in the iCursor/​Effects folder, which is generated the first time the application is run. The cursor effects are only displayed when the application is running.
Examples of iCursor effect files include Comet.iCursorFX, HyperSpace.iCursorFX, and Snow.iCursorFX.

description: Data file that stores settings for an iCursor effect; used to apply special effects to the cursor in Mac OS X; can be customized by selecting iCursor → Customize Effect... within the iCursor application.
